sentences.cn: ...巧妙地讽刺流行歌曲的滑稽短剧。

sentences.en: a skit on daytime TV programmes
sentences.cn: 戏评日间电视节目的幽默短文

sentences.en: ANY event that makes life inconvenient for the victim can be made into a skit.
sentences.cn: 任何使受害者生活不便利的事件能成为被故意安排的情况.

sentences.en: Group Skit: the legal disputes on the journey to the West, by Polytechnic University.
sentences.cn: 幽默小品《今日说法特别节目-“西天路上, 特别法度”》纽约理工大学.

sentences.en: In the skit Molly's friends Bill, Mary, and Tim played the parts of teenagers who smoked.
sentences.cn: 在短剧中莫莉的朋友比尔, 玛丽和提姆扮演吸烟的青少年.

sentences.en: The comic skIt'sent up the foolishness of young men in love.
sentences.cn: 那幅画把沉溺于热恋中的青年男子的痴态勾勒得滑稽可笑.

sentences.en: The grandpa in this skit is one example. How hard he tries to learn English!
sentences.cn: 在这个小品中,您将看到爷爷是多么努力地学英语.

sentences.en: The inoculation method demonstrated in the skIt'starring Molly and her friends is called role playing.
sentences.cn: 莫莉及其好友们主演的小品短剧里展示的预防接种法,叫做角色扮演.

sentences.en: W : The granny in this skit is one example. How hard she tries to learn English!
sentences.cn: 在这个小品中, 您将看到老奶奶是多么努力地学英语.

trans.tran_cn: 讽刺文，小喜剧，<口>若干，一群
trans.tran_en: a short humorous performance or piece of writing
